about_the_game:
Switch Model Railroad is a small two baseboard route that offers plenty of switching opportunities between the yard and the industries. This route offers the ability to complete the tasks in any order, but requires thinking as the route only contains one siding. Think you can do it and not get stuck? If so, then turn on the power system, grab the controller, and select your locomotive.


Included gameplay sessions:
Switching Duties - offers approximately 90 minutes of gameplay
Base session - use this to create your own sessions


Developed by Hiawathamr Trainz Add-ons

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
